sentence.Network_en: A dirty cut may go septic.
sentence.Network_cn: 伤口不干净容易受感染。

sentence.Network_en: A flake of plaster from the ceiling fell into his eye, which became septic.
sentence.Network_cn: 天花板上的一小片熟石膏掉到他眼里，致使他的眼睛感染了。

sentence.Network_en: A dirty cut may become septic , ie affected by bacteria.

。。。 – 无菌无菌无菌无菌(sterile) – 无致病菌无致病菌无致病菌无致病菌(aseptic) – 腐败的腐败的腐败的腐败的(septic) – 抑菌抑菌.
寄托蓝宝书速记版 ... sepulchral adj. 坟墓的，阴深的,忧郁的 septic adj. 腐败的 n.腐烂物 sequela n. 后继者, 后遗症.
experimental study on septic rats treated by xuebijing injection ., 血必净注射液治疗大鼠脓毒症的实验研究.

list.abs: ...上层的水化物体,进入管道流走,防止了管道堵塞,给固化物体,粪便等垃圾,有充足的时间水解,化粪池,septic tank,指的是将生活污水分格沉淀,及对污泥进行厌氧消化的小型处理构筑物, .  目录1.
败血性休克（septic shock），是指罹患严重败血症（sepsis）的部分病人，出现无法由抢救输液（fluid resuscitation）挽回的低血压…
septectomy 鼻甲隔切除术septic infarct 败血性梗塞septic shock 败血病性休克
sepsis 败血症septic poison 腐败毒septicemia 败血症

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek sēptikos, from sēpein 'make rotten'

entry.tran: (伤口或身体部位)受感染的，感染病菌的
entry.def: If a wound or a part of your body becomes septic, it becomes infected.

example.ex: A flake of plaster from the ceiling fell into his eye, which became septic.
example.tran: 天花板上的一小片熟石膏掉到他眼里，致使他的眼睛感染了。

means.word_mean: 1. containing or resulting from disease-causing organisms;
2. of or relating to or caused by putrefaction;

sentences.sentence: "the septic action occurs at the bottom of the septic tank"

auth_sentence.content: Guess what I found among many egregious errors on septic web sites?
auth_sentence.res_content: Guess what I found among many egregious errors on septic web sites?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Guess what I found among many egregious errors on septic web sites?

auth_sentence.content: He says some thieves use septic trucks designed to empty portable toilets.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says some thieves use septic trucks designed to empty portable toilets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says some thieves use septic trucks designed to empty portable toilets.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或科学"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

ascet练习+ic……的→adj.禁欲的 n.苦行者
elast+ic……的→adj.弹性的
electron电子+ic……的→adj.电子的
fan狂热者+at+ic……的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者
